I'm running Julia on a cluster to be able to use the clusters GPU cards. When I try to use CUDA.jl, it first tries to install CUDA111 artifacts. However, it fails because there is not enough space left on the device:
`Warning: Failed to create the file /scratch/922006/jl_BfIweK-download.gz: No space left on device`
Is there some way to change the download location of artifacts to another location? I'm reading the artifacts documentation but it's a bit over my head. I don't have sudo access on the cluster.
